ValidationRule.description: SP-4449: Validation rule that triggers an error whenever someone tries to update an Inbound Case status to Resolve and the Order Number is empty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation), ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "CD_Inbound_Case"|| RecordType.DeveloperName = "Talabat_Inbound_Case"|| RecordType.DeveloperName = "PY_Inbound_Case"|| RecordType.DeveloperName = "AT_Inbound_Case"|| RecordType.DeveloperName = "FP_Inbound_Case" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "HU_Inbound_Case" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "YE_Inbound_Case" ), ISBLANK(Order_Number__c), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Resolved"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Case_Reason_Level_1__c,"Live order inquiries by restaurant"), ISPICKVAL(Case_Reason_Level_1__c,"Live Order Process"), ISPICKVAL(Case_Reason_Level_1__c,"Post-Delivery"), ISPICKVAL(Case_Reason_Level_1__c,"Across Journey") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a Order Number before resolving the case
